Title: Portrait of a Lady
Description: Many great pieces of art are results of great love.  A merchant in Halfhill wishes to have a portrait made for his beloved, as a birthday present.  Will you accept this commission?
ObjectivesText: Paint a Portrait of Madam Goya and bring it to Inkmaster Glenzu at the Arboretum, in the Jade Forest. The recipe can be found in your Inscription pane under Quests.
